channel.title: General Movies Juggling Spiders on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Movies Juggling Spiders on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: spiders are apparently good luck
item.description: So i was playing computer and a spider crawled down my screen. It was really little. really really little. but now that it has disappeared i feel it crawling all over my body. heh. I think my favorite new movie director is Michel Gondry. I was not aware that he was a drummer. Apparently he played drums on a Kanye West track. Amazing. His new movie looks quite nice. Science des rÃªves, La.
